table.name: vtiger_tickets
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_tickets` (`ticketsid` int(11) default NULL, `ticketsno` varchar(100) default NULL, `tksticketname` varchar(255) default NULL ,`tickets_tkstickettype` varchar(100) default NULL ,`tksdescription` varchar(250) default NULL ,`tksamountavailable` varchar(25) default NULL ,`tksticketprice` decimal(25,2) default NULL ,`tkschannels` varchar(100) default NULL ,`tksstartdate` date default NULL ,`tksenddate` date default NULL ,`tksticketowner` varchar(100) default NULL ,`tksevent` varchar(100) default NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_ticketscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ticketscf` (`ticketsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ticketsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
